languages.text: Говорят, ксенос Маражай неоднократно отправлялся в сии темные сектора, чтобы выследить и истребить чудовище, но каждый раз возвращался с охоты в плачевном виде. Впрочем, сам он лишь гордился обретенным опытом и верил, что однажды преуспеет.

It is said that the xenos Marazhai travelled to these dark sectors to hunt down and exterminate the beast more than once, but each time he limped back in a sorry state. He was proud of his experience, however, and believed that one day he would succeed.
languages.original_text: Говорят, ксенос Маражай неоднократно отправлялся в сии темные сектора, чтобы выследить и истребить чудовище, но каждый раз возвращался с охоты в плачевном виде. Впрочем, сам он лишь гордился обретенным опытом и верил, что однажды преуспеет.

traits.locale_text: It is said that xenos Marazhai had travelled to these dark sectors to hunt down and exterminate the beast more than once, but each time he limped back in a sorry state. He was proud of his experience, however, and believed that some day he would succeed.

It is said that xenos Marazhai had travelled to these dark sectors to hunt down and exterminate the beast more than once, but each time he limped back in a sorry state. He was proud of his experience, however, and believed that some day he would succeed.

It is said that the xenos Marazhai travelled to these dark sectors to hunt down and exterminate the beast more than once, but each time he limped back in a sorry state. He was proud of his experience, however, and believed that one day he would succeed.

It is said that the xenos Marazhai travelled to these dark sectors to hunt down and exterminate the beast more than once, but each time he limped back in a sorry state. He was proud of his experience, however, and believed that one day he would succeed.

It is said that the xenos Marazhai travelled to these dark sectors to hunt down and exterminate the beast more than once, but each time he limped back in a sorry state. He was proud of his experience, however, and believed that one day he would succeed.

languages.text: 据说，玛拉斋不止一次前往这些区域，打算亲手消灭这头野狼，但每次都被打得落花流水，一瘸一拐地回来。不过，他为自己的狩猎经历自豪不已，坚信自己有朝一日会消灭那头猎物。
languages.original_text: It is said that the xenos Marazhai travelled to these dark sectors to hunt down and exterminate the beast more than once, but each time he limped back in a sorry state. He was proud of his experience, however, and believed that one day he would succeed.

traits.locale_text: 据说，玛拉斋不止一次前往这些区域，打算亲手消灭这头野狼，但每次都被打得落花流水，一瘸一拐地回来。不过，他为自己的狩猎经历自豪不已，坚信自己有朝一日会消灭那头猎物。

languages.text: 異種族、マラズハイは獣を殲滅するために闇のセクターへ何度も旅をしたが、毎回惨めな様子で足を引きずって帰ってきた。彼は自身の経験を誇りに思っており、いつか自分が成功すると信じていた。
languages.original_text: It is said that the xenos Marazhai travelled to these dark sectors to hunt down and exterminate the beast more than once, but each time he limped back in a sorry state. He was proud of his experience, however, and believed that one day he would succeed.

traits.locale_text: 異種族、マラズハイは獣を殲滅するために闇のセクターへ何度も旅をしたが、毎回惨めな様子で足を引きずって帰ってきた。彼は自身の経験を誇りに思っており、いつか自分が成功すると信じていた。

languages.text: Il se raconte que le xénos Marazhai se rendit plusieurs fois dans ces secteurs obscurs pour traquer et exterminer la bête, mais qu'il revint chaque fois dans un triste état. Il était fier de son expérience, toutefois, et croyait dur comme fer parvenir un jour à ses fins.
languages.original_text: It is said that the xenos Marazhai travelled to these dark sectors to hunt down and exterminate the beast more than once, but each time he limped back in a sorry state. He was proud of his experience, however, and believed that one day he would succeed.

traits.locale_text: Il se raconte que le xénos Marazhai se rendit plusieurs fois dans ces secteurs obscurs pour traquer et exterminer la bête, mais qu'il revint chaque fois dans un triste état. Il était fier de son expérience, toutefois, et croyait dur comme fer parvenir un jour à ses fins.

languages.text: Se dice que el xenos Marazhai viajó a estos sectores oscuros para dar caza y exterminar a la bestia en más de una ocasión, pero en todas ellas se acabó retirando en un estado lamentable. No obstante, estaba orgulloso de su experiencia y creía que algún día lo conseguiría.
languages.original_text: It is said that the xenos Marazhai travelled to these dark sectors to hunt down and exterminate the beast more than once, but each time he limped back in a sorry state. He was proud of his experience, however, and believed that one day he would succeed.

traits.locale_text: Se dice que el xenos Marazhai viajó a estos sectores oscuros para dar caza y exterminar a la bestia en más de una ocasión, pero en todas ellas se acabó retirando en un estado lamentable. No obstante, estaba orgulloso de su experiencia y creía que algún día lo conseguiría.

languages.text: Angeblich ist der Xenos Marazhai mehr als einmal in diese dunklen Sektoren gereist, um die Bestie aufzuspüren und zu erlegen, aber jedes Mal kam er in beklagenswertem Zustand zurückgehumpelt. Dennoch war er stolz auf die Erfahrung und glaubte, er würde eines Tages Erfolg haben.
languages.original_text: It is said that the xenos Marazhai travelled to these dark sectors to hunt down and exterminate the beast more than once, but each time he limped back in a sorry state. He was proud of his experience, however, and believed that one day he would succeed.

traits.locale_text: Angeblich ist der Xenos Marazhai mehr als einmal in diese dunklen Sektoren gereist, um die Bestie aufzuspüren und zu erlegen, aber jedes Mal kam er in beklagenswertem Zustand zurückgehumpelt. Dennoch war er stolz auf die Erfahrung und glaubte, er würde eines Tages Erfolg haben.

languages.text: Marazhai isimli zenonun bu karanlık sektörlerde seyahat ettiği ve yaratığı birden fazla kez bulup yok etmeye çalıştığı, her seferinde de perişan hâlde geri çekildiği söyleniyor. O ise bu deneyimlerinden gurur duyuyordu ve bir gün başarılı olacağına inanıyordu.
languages.original_text: It is said that the xenos Marazhai travelled to these dark sectors to hunt down and exterminate the beast more than once, but each time he limped back in a sorry state. He was proud of his experience, however, and believed that one day he would succeed.

traits.locale_text: Marazhai isimli zenonun bu karanlık sektörlerde seyahat ettiği ve yaratığı birden fazla kez bulup yok etmeye çalıştığı, her seferinde de perişan hâlde geri çekildiği söyleniyor. O ise bu deneyimlerinden gurur duyuyordu ve bir gün başarılı olacağına inanıyordu.
